response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just any commodity; it's a piece of history and craftsmanship that has been meticulously preserved and enhanced over time. I believe its true worth exceeds $1,500,000, but considering the current market conditions and my desire to see it go to someone who truly appreciates its significance, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,750,000. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time only, so please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or arranging a viewing. I look forward to the possibility of working with you on this exciting acquisition.", "product_price": 1750000}
